name.ja: <ruby>氷<rt>ヒ</rt></ruby><ruby>水<rt>スイ</rt></ruby><ruby>大<rt>ダイ</rt></ruby><ruby>剣<rt>ケン</rt></ruby><ruby>現<rt>ゲン</rt></ruby>

text.en: If your opponent has a monster on their field and/or in their GY, and you control a WATER monster: You can take 1 "Icejade" monster from your Deck, and either send it to the GY or Special Summon it. If a face-up "Icejade" monster you control leaves the field by an opponent's card, except by being destroyed (and except during the Damage Step): You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 card your opponent controls; banish it. You can only use each effect of "Great Icejade Manifestation" once per turn.
